str2: And if, whether. From ei and te; if too.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
And if, whether. From ei and te; if too.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To proclaim, herald, preach. Of uncertain affinity; to herald, especially divine truth.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
